virgo.Prediction: You might have a lot of mental energy today, Virgo, and feel more analytical than usual. It's a good day to work on projects that require concentration and focus. You may feel particularly compatible with Taurus today, as they share your practical and reliable nature. In terms of love, this could be a good day for deep conversations and connecting with your partner on a mental level.

You may feel particularly compatible with Pisces today, as they share your intuitive and emotional nature. In terms of love, this could be a good day to try something new and exciting with your partner.

This can be a time to let go of old patterns that no longer serve you and embrace new ways of connecting with others. This is a good time to focus on your inner thoughts and feelings. Your intuition may be heightened, so pay attention to any hunches or gut feelings that you have. You may find that your analytical skills are also quite sharp, so use this to your advantage when making decisions. However, with the Moon in a Waning crescent phase, it's important to let go of any negative thoughts or feelings that may be holding you back. Try to release any worries or doubts that you have and focus on the positive aspects of your life. This will help you to feel more optimistic and confident.
